Html:
Hey,

Its an excellent library to use in projects... I've a query, Can i save Mp3 Stream file? If yes how to implement it. I mean Should I store raw stream that is coming through internet or should I save it frame by frame... If some one already has implemented it kindly help me out.
if you're receiving MP3 data over the network, you could just save the raw stream straight to disk. The MP3 file format is very robust against problems such as incomplete frames.

markheath thank you very much for helping. If you can provide working example Naudio + Your suggestion

Thanks in advance.
By the way I've done it thanks...
